user_query: I'm organizing a charity event to raise funds for a cause. Can you recommend a powerful quote about compassion to include in our promotional materials? Also, fetch me a random Yes or No response to add an element of surprise to our event. Lastly, provide me with the details of the artists and events happening in the upcoming club series.

TaskList.description: Fetch a powerful quote about compassion to use in promotional materials.
Generate a random Yes or No response for adding an element of surprise to the event.
Retrieve the details of the artists and events for the upcoming club series.
